document.full_text: a washington state man and an oregon woman were arrested on wednesday at the request of officials in bosnia and herzegovina, to face accusations they committed war crimes there 18 years ago.
document.title: washington man, oregon woman arrested over bosnian war crimes
lines_and_colors: a washington state man and an oregon woman were arrested on wednesday at the request of officials in bosnia and herzegovina, to face accusations they committed war crimes there 18 years ago.
